name: ATFunctionalRunnerEL
description: ATFunctionalRunnerEL is a Scriptable Functional test framework

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . at-functional-runner-el --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64  --icon=icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="TS" --version-string.FileDescription="AT Functional Runner EL" --version-string.ProductName="AT Functional Runner EL"

author: Thomas Schmidt
